body_html: Yeah, it does make sense :) My confusion stems from the fact that we're using cookie-based session management already. I know that closing the browser resets the session but I am not sure if this is the reason behind the reported logouts: I rarely ever close my browser (I close the laptop lid and continue where I left next time) but I do get these logouts as well. I cannot tell how often, though.

body: Yeah, it does make sense :)  My confusion stems from the fact that we're using cookie-based session management already. I know that closing the browser resets the session but I am not sure if this is the reason behind the reported logouts: I rarely ever close my browser (I close the laptop lid and continue where I left next time) but I do get these logouts as well. I cannot tell how often, though.
